title: Interpretation of seeing plums in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing plums in a dream or a dream Plums are a fruit that is eaten fresh and dried. Seeing plums in a dream means success, luck, and earning money without getting tired. It can indicate the marriage of an unmarried girl. We will explain in detail the interpretation of seeing plums in a dream for a married man and a single young man, as well as for a single person, married, pregnant, divorced, widowed, and others. Providing interpretations of the great imams of ancient inquirers such as Ibn Sirin, so share with us on the Vision website. Interpretation of plums in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin Seeing plums in a dream for a married man indicates an abundance of money from a profitable business or a prestigious job that brings him a lot of money. See eating plums indicates hearing good news and wishing you good luck. See pruning indicates success, luck and fulfillment of desires. Seeing green plums in a dream indicates recovery from illness. Seeing rotten plums indicates material losses or not studying or leaving work for the worker. What is the interpretation of seeing plums in a dream for a single woman? Seeing buying plums in a dream for a single woman indicates the approaching engagement or marriage to a wealthy young man. Seeing green plums in an unmarried girl's dream shows the loss of anxiety and sadness and finding solutions to their problems. What is the interpretation of a dream about black plums for a single woman? Seeing black plums indicates that he received an inheritance or a comfortable job with a rewarding salary. Seeing dried black plums shows making the right decisions. Check the plum collection indicates the girl's upcoming marriage. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating red plums For a single woman? Seeing red plums in a single dream indicates her engagement or marriage if she is engaged. Seeing a plum tree indicates success in studies if she is a student or has obtained a prestigious job. What is the interpretation of eating plums in a dream for a single woman? Seeing eating plums in a dream for a single girl indicates the fulfillment of one's desires in life and their fulfillment. Watch drinking plum juice. It indicates reaching the highest levels of success and good luck. What is the interpretation of yellow plums in a dream? Seeing yellow plums in a dream for a married woman indicates happiness, marital stability, and the end of disputes and quarrels. Seeing buying plums in a dream for a single woman indicates a new romantic relationship or engagement. Seeing sour plums indicates marital or family problems and may indicate problems in the field of work for a married man. Seeing picking plums in a married woman's dream indicates that he has obtained an amount of money that may be an inheritance or a reward in work and living. Seeing green plums in a dream, a married woman indicates the end of marital disputes and problems. What is the interpretation of eating plums for a pregnant woman? Seeing plums in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates Ease of childbirth and its ease and eliminating the problems of pregnancy and childbirth. I see myself eating plums. It indicates an abundance of sustenance and an abundance of goodness for the pregnant woman, her marital happiness and joy with the newborn. Seeing black plums indicates the birth of a boy. Seeing sour juice indicates problems during pregnancy and childbirth. We are pleased to see the reception of your dreams about “Interpretation of Visions

title: The full implications of interpreting a dream about getting on and off a train by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about riding and getting off a train: Seeing a train is one of the visions that we often see in the world of dreams, especially seeing a train traveling at high speed or watching a train heading to a specific destination and also getting off of it without knowing the reason. The dreamer sees the dream has different interpretations and what we will explain is the interpretation of seeing the train entering and exiting the train. Interpretation of the dream of riding and getting off the train: The train symbolizes a person whose personality is characterized by strength, control and leadership and who tends to achieve his goals regardless of the dangers of the road. The train also indicates human life Which can be lost without doing anything mentioned or prolonged, depending on the condition of the viewer and the extent to which he sets priorities and plans for the battles that he will fight firmly and seriously. Sometimes the train shows things that the viewer feels are lost or lost for him, such as having a job and then losing it without going to it, or earning money. He did not get it due to the delay. If he sees that the train he wants to take has gone on its way without boarding, this is a sign that he is postponing the work assigned to him, or that he is missing important opportunities that the fortuneteller should have taken advantage of. Someone did it for him. Driving a train means that you make the perfect decision and start implementing it with all the strength, will, and desire to get what you want. Seeing two trains symbolizes the confusion into which the viewer falls, and if they collide with each other, this indicates hesitation and an inability to think clearly. True. Al-Nabulsi believes that the leadership of huge media outlets can be prestige and power, or injustice and erosion of people’s rights. Waiting for a train without boarding it is evidence of the dreamer not fulfilling his meals, wasting his time in entertainment, and wasting blessings on his hands. And the train derailing from its tracks is evidence of walking. On different paths and committing sins and heresies that corrupt religion and the world. Seeing riding and getting off a train in a dream is one of the dreams that is interpreted in more than one way, as follows: Getting off the train after riding it indicates that the dreamer may have failed to achieve what he wants and that his choice is in The beginning was not correct, so his getting off was tantamount to preserving what he had left. The vision also symbolizes decisions that must be reviewed and examined with a wise eye in order to get out of the predicament he put himself in. If the dreamer gets on the train and then gets off at a station other than the one he was in, Already heading towards it, this indicates extreme exhaustion, inability to continue, stopping walking and feeling hopeless. This dream is like listening to the dreamer’s voice without listening to other opinions, and this exposes him to making mistakes. Feeling sad when descending indicates exiting the battle without Big gains, failure and a bad psychological state. The vision as a whole can be very promising, if the dreamer feels happy in the dream, then this vision at that time represents the achievement of the desired goals, the achievement of the desired and the achievement of a state of great success, because getting off the train is the achievement of the desired goal and for this reason The reason was revealed. Maybe a

title: Interpretation of seeing a cow being beaten in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cow being beaten in a dream or a dream through the vision site roy2a.com and seeing a cow being beaten indicates the marriage of a single young man and an unmarried girl and a fat cow indicates years and years and fertility and abundance of money and skinny cows indicate poverty, fatigue and illness, we will explain it in detail Interpretation of seeing a cow being beaten in a dream Providing interpretations of imams such as Ibn Sirin and other scholars of interpretation in visions and dreams in ancient and modern times in a dream for a young man and an unmarried girl for a man and a married woman and a widow and divorced women as well as for a pregnant woman Follow us on the vision site. What is the interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream for Ibn Sirin: Seeing a cow being beaten in a dream It indicates a lot of goodness and abundance of food, a year full of fertility, an abundance of good deeds, and an abundance of money. A cow in a dream It indicates years and years, fat cows indicate goodness and living and abundance of money, and skinny cows indicate poverty, lack of livelihood and lack of money. Seeing yourself eating beef in a dream It indicates an abundance of money and happy news See riding Cows indicate good luck and high status. Seeing a yellow cow indicates a lot of goodness, joy, pleasure and the death of sadness. Seeing a poor man drinking cow's milk indicates wealth and stability in work. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cow's breast in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a cow being beaten in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried woman dreams of being beaten by a cow, remember her approach to marriage. If a girl sees a cow chasing her in a dream,. It indicates good luck and success. What is the interpretation of seeing a cow being beaten in a dream for a married woman: A dream about beating a cow in a dream about a married woman indicates good news and happy occasions and can indicate marital problems and arguments if the cow is raging. Seeing a fat cow indicates hearing good news, wealth, happiness and family stability. See also: Interpretation of seeing a yellow cow in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a cow in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a bored cow in a pregnant woman's dream portends a lot of goodness and money. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating roast beef, it indicates an abundance of goodness and an abundance of livelihood. Seeing a fat cow in a pregnant woman's dream indicates an increase in beauty, food and easy childbirth. What is the interpretation of seeing a cow being beaten in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees that an angry cow is being beaten in a dream, it indicates betrayal and betrayal of the woman by someone. Seeing a cow being beaten in a divorced woman's dream indicates committing a sin. If a divorced woman sees that the cow is talking to her, it indicates her wealth and promotion at work or getting a job with a salary Rewarding. See also: Interpretation of seeing a black cow in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream about a raging cow: Seeing a raging cow in a dream indicates failure in projects and commercial and material losses. Seeing the death of a cow in a dream indicates that you hear bad news, fears and pains and may indicate the death of a close person. Seeing an unknown cow indicates problems and fears in the dreamer's life and may indicate an illness that afflicts the dreamer. What is the interpretation of the solution

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a father in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing a father in a dream: Seeing a father or parents in general is considered desirable by many of us and we do not find anything wrong with it. However, the interpretation of this vision depends on the details and the condition of the dreamer. There are some cases in which the vision is unpleasant due to the father’s illness, fatigue, sadness, poor physical condition, etc., and there are cases that deserve it. Praise is like a father appearing in a good image, and in this article we detail all the indicators and special cases. Interpretation of a dream about a father. Seeing a father in a dream. Seeing a father expresses calm, peace, safe haven, sustenance, divine blessings, and the enjoyment of many advantages and gifts. And whoever sees his father wearing a white dress, this indicates his fragrant biography among the people, his famous status, and his high status due to his will for goodness, generosity, and kindness. And if he sees His father is smiling at him, and he has a good picture, so this is a sign of great status, high grades, reaping wishes, and a great promotion. But if the father dies and it appears in the dream that he is sick, then he needs to beg, give charity, and visit, then the priest may be delinquent in his case, or forget. The orders of the father and the trust that were revealed to him. Seeing a father in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing the father indicates the livelihood that the dreamer earns without counting, the job that he seeks and enjoys, the good reputation that he obtains from his father, the satisfaction of needs, and the achievement of goals. It also indicates This vision indicates the return of the absent person, the meeting with the traveler, recovery from illness, expansion of sustenance, and the luxury of life when needed. And if he witnesses the slaughter of his father, this indicates justice, kinship, and great benefit, if there is no blood. But if he sees blood, this is a sign of disobedience. And disobedience, and seeing the father alive after his death is evidence of comfort, loss of worry, and renewed hope. Seeing the father in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq says that the father is shelter, security, spaciousness, a comfortable life, an increase in the world, news and joys, a way out of adversity, and freedom from danger. And whoever sees his father in a good image, this is a sign. Goodness, abundance, food supply, change of situation, end of worries, and dispersal of sorrows. And whoever sees his father dying, this indicates corruption of the heart, bad intentions, loss of his worldly life, and lack of money. And if he sees his father returning to him or approaching him in a good manner, this indicates meeting the absent person, and hopes are renewed again. Seeing a father in a dream for a single woman, and for an unmarried woman, the father indicates housing, tranquility, stability, achieving goals and objectives, fulfilling goals and dreams, and removing obstacles from her path. If she sees her father sad, this is sadness for her condition or sadness for her. In both cases, the vision is considered a warning of the need to honor and benevolent the father and not Negligence in righteousness. from. If you see the father happy, this is a sign of changing circumstances, reviving hope in the heart, ending worries and sorrow, meeting needs, and overcoming obstacles and difficulties. Seeing the father in a dream for a married woman. The father in her dream represents the well-being of life and the growth of the world, receiving advice and arriving at satisfactory solutions.

title: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a father in a dream according to the major imams of interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a father: When a dream comes about the death of a father in a dream, the dreamer is overwhelmed with a feeling of sadness, fear, and anxiety, so he begins to search for him. The interpretation of a dream about the death of a father is the good or bad that interprets this vision and is a warning of the death of the father in reality, and this we present in our next article on the Differin website. Now in the interpretation of the dream of the death of the father in a dream, the leading imams of interpretation 2021. The opinion of Ibn Sirin on the interpretation of the death of the father in a dream. A different clearer site. Ibn Sirin said if the dreamer sees that his father died in a dream, then this dream is an interpretation of the psychological state that the dreamer is going through, which is a bad psychological state accompanied by With depression. If the dreamer’s vision is of the father’s death and then his return to life in the dream, then this vision is only a description of the despair that the dreamer is suffering from due to some problems, but soon he will get rid of these problems and the anxiety will go away. As Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of the father’s death in a dream A small child is evidence that the father of that child loves him very much and wishes to achieve his happiness. If the father is sick in reality and his son or daughter dreams in a dream of his death, then this dream is good news of the end of the illness and that God will grant the father health and wellness. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a father in one dreamInterpretation of a dream about the death of a father in An unmarried person’s dream that he is dead, in reality, indicates that he is moving in directions that do not please her deceased father, especially if the vision is the father’s death and he is angry with his unmarried daughter. If an unmarried girl dreams of her father’s death in a dream, this does not mean that it is a warning that this It will happen in reality as some believe, but it is an indication that the father will enjoy a long life. The death of a father in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she will hear good news, perhaps her engagement or marriage. From the interpretation of a dream about the death of a father, the symbol of the death of a father in an unmarried girl’s dream is Evidence of the occurrence of situations that change the course of a father’s life in reality. The death of a father in a dream for a single woman explains that if an unmarried girl dreams of her father’s death in a dream, this dream indicates that she enjoys a stable life because of her father’s presence in her life. As for an unmarried girl, it represents A father left the country and she dreamed of her father’s death, so this dream is a sign of her father’s illness. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a black scorpion in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a married father. When a married woman dreams of her father’s death, this dream is good and has no meaning, but it portends the coming of blessing and its spread to her home and children. As for the symbol of the father’s death in a married woman’s dream, it indicates that she has a son who is leaving the country and longs to see him. As for the interpretation of the dream of the father’s death, in a dream for a married woman who was looking for pregnancy, this dream portends to her skin that she will become pregnant and she will be guaranteed good offspring who will enjoy prominent positions in society. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a father in a pregnant woman’s dream: If the dreamer is pregnant and sees in her dream that her father has died in a dream, then this is good news for her that she will soon give birth to a fetus of her kind, a male who has all the good things. Attributes and fairness to her and his father. In the event that a pregnant woman sees that her father

title: I dreamed that I was having sex with my wife

preview.html: I dreamed that I was in contact with my wife through a website. Looking at the website roy2a.com, sexual intercourse in the language is the process of sexual intercourse between a man and a woman, and it is also called intercourse and sexual intercourse. There is no doubt that intercourse between spouses is a lawful matter that requires an increase in offspring. And preparing society. Seeing sexual intercourse in a dream is one of the widespread visions. Today we will present the most important interpretations provided by the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen on this topic, so follow us. I dreamed that I was having sex with my wife. Seeing physical contact between spouses in a dream. I refer gently and lovingly to the friendly relationship and understanding between them. In reality, and to marital happiness for both parties. As for seeing intercourse in a dream by raping and coercing his wife? It indicates poor coexistence between them in reality and that he is a man who does not deserve his material and moral responsibilities. Not feeling happy when a man has intercourse with his wife in a dream indicates problems and disagreements between them. A man has intercourse with his wife in a dream. A dream about a satisfactory relationship shows that he has achieved the goals and desires he seeks in life and that he has good social relationships. Seeing a man having sex with his wife in public indicates that the embarrassing situation in the dream was an indication that there are secrets about their home that will be revealed. See also: Interpretation Intercourse in a dream in detail. I dreamed that I was in contact with my wife about Ibn Sirini. Ibn Shirin says that he sees in a dream a man having intercourse with his wife, indicating his ability to manage the affairs of his home and family and his constant search for what is best for their benefit. A man has intercourse with his wife until sperm comes out in a dream, indicating the goodness and livelihood that God will obtain in His life is the result of striving. Seeing intercourse in a dream, then the husband goes for purification and bathing, is a sign of the collapse of the worries and obstacles that the dreamer faces in his life, and good news for him of relief close to any distress. Ibn Sirin also reinterprets intercourse between spouses in a dream in relation to the situation between them in reality, if the dream is Happy and comfortable, it showed a good coexistence between them and vice versa. See also: I dreamed that I had sex with myself. A dream of socialization for single people. Seeing a single woman being fucked by someone in a dream. She was happy about this, indicating that her marriage is approaching, and she will be happy and satisfied. Seeing sexual intercourse in a woman’s dream may indicate Unmarried about the frozen lust and feelings that were buried inside her and she is thinking about marriage. A dream about sexual intercourse for a married woman. A married woman sees her husband having anal intercourse with her. He refuses to declare that he is right, and he is oppressing her and does not deserve her. A married woman dreamed that her husband had intercourse with her in a dream, indicating marital happiness between them, happy events, and obtaining What you want in life. I dreamed that I married a man other than my husband. The dream indicates that this woman will bring an advantage that will benefit her home and her husband, whether in trade or at work. Perhaps his vision indicates the honest messenger close to the kings, or the spy or the great controversial educated person. Perhaps it indicates the knowledge of God Almighty and His law in religion and prayer, so if he sees him thirsty, it leads to water. The salapetine is an educated man who is praised for his foul smell. Whoever sees him will gain dignity and money, and if he eats it, he will be better than the caliph. It was said: Whoever sees the hawk, a traveler will come to him, and perhaps he will be safe for the fearful. Tsalapetine is a man who has insight into his work, a critical writer. Whoever dreams that he hits him cracked or sees him standing in front of him, this is good news that he answers from afar. It was said: Whoever is struck by temptations: he has authority, or from a great writer, or a person with keen insight into what is not religious. And whoever sees that she was killed and he did not marry, he will marry, and if he kills her, he will marry a slave girl. And whoever dreams that he is struck, he collapses or sees him standing in front of him, this is true news that will bring him back from a distant country. A bachelor marries, and if he kills her, he is a virgin. Interpretation of the vagabond in a dream The two Tsalabitins were mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, where God Almighty narrated his famous story with our master Solomon, and this small bird was credited with revealing the Kingdom of Sheba, which was ruled by Queen Bilqis. And they worshipped the sun other than God, and the Prophet Solomon was ready to kill the falcon and slaughter it, as it had been absent from him for a long time without knowing the reason, and God Almighty says in His Noble Book: “And examine the falcon. He said: Why do I not see the one who is broken, or is he among the absent? Shall I punish him severely? I would have slaughtered him or he would have come to me with clear authority, so he did not stray far. ”From this story, the scholars of interpretation have reached many conclusions, from the interpretations of seeing Tsalapetin in a dream, and the following is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of the dream of the hoopoe by Ibn Sirin To see it indicates a messenger, a spy, or a scholar who has many differences. Anyone who dreams that Tsalapetin may contradict him, this is a good sign. It is said by senior interpreters of dreams that the interpretation of seeing Tsalapetin in a dream symbolizes a person who is a spy or many differences and can indicate an honest and loyal person. title: Interpretation of seeing a blender in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a blender in a dream or a dream Interpretation of a dream of a blender in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women What are the indications for seeing a blender in honey? The blender is one of the tools that women use for food. Preparing the blender and seeing it has come with many different interpretations, and we explain the following through Our article today is the interpretation of seeing a mixer in a dream on our website Vision. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of an electric mixer. Seeing an electric mixer in a dream indicates a lack of focus and distraction in making a fateful decision in the dreamer’s life. Seeing an electric mixer in a dream indicates a strong relationship between the dreamer and the people around him and his mingling. With everyone. Seeing an electric mixer in a dream indicates many children, brothers, and friends around the fortuneteller. Seeing an electric mixer in a dream indicates that the dreamer will meet his former friends and new experiences. Interpretation of seeing a mixer in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an electric mixer in a dream for a single girl shows that she is moving to a new place. In her life. Seeing an electric mixer in a single woman’s dream shows her relationship with a man and her marriage, and she will be happy in her life. Seeing a single girl using an electric mixer in a dream shows that she will go through new experiences and will be happy with them. Seeing a damaged or burnt mixer for a girl who is not yet married in a dream indicates that there are some problems in Her life, which causes her great sadness. Interpretation of seeing a blender in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a blender in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her family life. Seeing an electric blender in a married woman’s dream and saying that she has provided many children, which makes them happy and supports her in her life. Seeing the blender burning or falling and breaking it In a dream for a married woman, it indicates major marital differences that lead to separation. Interpretation of seeing a mixer in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing an electric mixer in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that her pregnancy will pass safely without any problems. Seeing an electric mixer in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates an easy and easy birth and the safety and well-being of her fetus. Vision An electric mixer in a dream for a pregnant woman shows the strong relationship between her and her family. Seeing an electric mixer in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates her many grandchildren in life. Interpretation of seeing an electric mixer in a dream for a man. Seeing an electric mixer in a dream for a man indicates that he will have multiple marriages and a large number of offspring as a result. A man sees an electric mixer in a dream for a man. The kitchen in a dream: It indicates the collapse of differences between him and others. Seeing an electric mixer for a man in a dream indicates former friends and the return of communication between them again. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream: Seeing iron in a dream: It indicates preparation for something to happen to the pioneer. Seeing iron with iron: It indicates a close marriage. Seeing clothes burning in the iron indicates a life partner. Seeing a woman in a dream that she is ironing clothes indicates that she is seeking to change her behavior with the owner of the clothes and achieve peace. Interpretation of seeing a heater in a dream. Vision

title: Interpretation of eating apples in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of eating apples in a dream, we often have dreams in which other interpretations appear that we did not expect, so we resort to the science of dream interpretation which sometimes surprises us that the dream has a bad character or a bad omen, even though it seems to show comfort and happiness after waiting and worry and often What the dream is associated with certain foods that have meaning, and must be interpreted so that the person takes care of them and avoids problems, troubles, and burdens, and this is what we will learn today through the interpretation of the dream of eating apples in a dream among scholars. Interpretation of eating apples in a dreamApples in a dream are food, kindness, and good news for success, increased nutrition, and recovery from Diseases. An apple in a dream is a man’s strength, it indicates that the dreamer is a man of status, knowledge and wisdom. Buying apples in a dream symbolizes the good that the dreamer will receive and this may mean a new job. Eating fresh red apples in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and the achievement of goals. Sour apples symbolize forbidden money. Seeing someone eating a large apple is a sign of someone who is jealous of his diet and God’s blessings upon him. Planting an apple tree in a dream means caring for and caring for an orphan child. Feeding children with apples in a dream is a sign of lawful nutrition and upbringing. Goodness and blessing in the lives and health of these children. Interpretation of eating red apples in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman eating red apples in a dream indicates that she will marry a good man. While biting a red apple symbolizes the acquisition of lawful money and abundance of sustenance, it also indicates a change in One's circumstances are for the better. An unmarried woman who sees a man offering her a red apple in a dream represents that God promises her that a good man will provide for her and she will find happiness with him. Eating green apples in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing apples in a person’s dream varies depending on their color. Here is an interpretation for a single woman who sees green apples in a dream: Green apples in one’s dream indicate ambition and the pursuit of goals. While yellow apples indicate illness and anxiety. A single apple symbolizes deep-rooted desires that a woman tries to express but cannot express. Apples indicate Rotten or sour in one’s dream indicates troubled, family or romantic relationships. Eating apricots from apple trees is considered a sign of sadness and pain as well as illness. Giving apples in a dream According to what was narrated on the authority of the venerable Imam Al-Nabulsi in the interpretation of giving apples in a dream, we say the following: It indicates Giving apples in a dream from one person to another indicates the existence of a mutual relationship of love, respect and friendship between them. A man giving apples in a dream to a girl symbolizes a network and an engagement proposal. Giving red apples to a dead person in a dream is evidence of the alms that the dreamer gives him, and that they reach the dead person. From him, and God knows best. Whoever sees that there is an angel giving him an apple, this indicates a lot of happy and good news for the pioneer. Picking apples in a dream Picking apples in a dream has many meanings.
